item.title: 113H Scania Bicuda BR v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 24, 2025

113H Scania Bicuda BR v1.0 ETS2

Scania Bicuda BR ETS2 113H Truck Mod
This mod, besides being one of the most sought-after by professional truck enthusiasts, brings the essence of realism and practicality, as well as the power to carry the largest loads on the world’s roads.
The Scania 113H, also known as the “bicuda,” is an iconic truck that marked the history of road transport in Brazil. Produced between 1991 and 1998, the 113H is recognized for its durability, power, and innovative design for its time.
11-liter engine: Available in 310, 320, and 360 horsepower versions, ensuring strength and economy.
Topline Cab: This was the first Scania model to adopt this cab, providing more space and comfort for drivers.
Reliability: Many trucks traveled over 1 million kilometers with only preventive maintenance, which was impressive for the time.
Popularity: With over 26,000 units sold in Brazil, the 113H has become an icon among truck drivers, earning the nickname “the indestructible truck.”
The Scania 113H was widely used for transporting heavy loads over long distances, synonymous with efficiency and durability. Even after its production ended, it continues to be celebrated and is a coveted object among collectors and road professionals.
Now brought directly from the streets to the simulator, you’ll have the pleasure of driving one of Brazil’s most popular iconic vehicles.
For ETS 2 versions: | 1.54.x | 1.55.x | 1.56.x
Mod Information:
Cabin animations;
Animated antennas;
Engines with various horsepower and realistic sound.
Chassis: 4×2, 6×2, and 6×4, with or without liftable axles.
– 6 Steering Wheel Options: (Original Scania 113H);
– Floor Mat Options;
– Cab Upholstery Options;
– Camera can be rotated to the rear of the cab for a wider view;
– Luggage Rack Options;
– Options: Benches and beds;
– Cabin Light: Orange, Marajoara Blue, or White.
Tip: To turn on the cabin light, use the same button as the rotating beacon.
– Tank Options: round, square, painted, or chrome;
– Battery Box: Chrome, original black, or painted;
– Exhaust Options;
– Designed based on the technical specifications of the original Scania 113H truck;
– Panel Options: Black, Black with brushed steel, and Wood.
– Original 113H paint jobs, custom paint jobs, and skins for you to edit, including: 6 Edite Skins with normal paint jobs and 6 Edite Skins with metallic paint jobs;
– Window and door handle animations;
– Front grille: Painted, normal matte, or chrome;
– Chassis options: 4×2, 6×2, 6×4, original, or lowered;
– Functional pedals: Animated accelerator and brake.
– Dashboard with animations on the functional buttons;
– PX radio and compressed air: Springs with animations that move with the truck’s rocking.
– Windshield installation options: Blue or Smoked Gradient.
– More realistic suspension added;
– Tinted or original mirrors;
– Window gutter option;
– Animations on cargo hitches;
– The levers work for parking brakes and trailer brakes;
This mod was created from real trucks brought from the streets into the game. It doesn’t replace the original trucks in the game, allowing both the 113H and 143H to expand your garage.

Credits: fc

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: G6 Scania 6×2 Paradiso 1550 LD Premium v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 24, 2025

G6 Scania 6×2 Paradiso 1550 LD Premium v1.0 ETS2

For ETS 2 versions: | 1.54.x | 1.55.x | 1.56.x

This Mod Contains:
– Scania steering wheel options: Old.
– Engines with various horsepower;
– Various transmission options;
– Skins from the largest trucking companies and 20 for you to edit;
– Cabin, aisle, and luggage compartment lights: (Tip: To turn on the light, use the same button as the rotating beacon)
– 3 texture options: Driver’s cabin, seats, curtains, and luggage compartment;
– 3D made from scratch, 4K graphics, and super lightweight for greater performance;
– Realistic shadows;
– License plates to choose from;
– Functional pedals with animations: Brake and accelerator.
– 3-speed windshield wipers.
– Dashboard with functional animations;
– Animations on the door, luggage rack, and driver’s window;
– Optional: Passengers boarding and disembarking.
– Editable signage;
And many more exclusive extras for you to customize to your liking.
The Marcopolo Paradiso G6 1550 LD bus series is quite popular in Brazil. Launched in 2011, this bus body line is known for its comfort, durability, and modern design. It is equipped with several advanced technologies, such as improved suspension systems and efficient engines, providing a smooth and safe ride.
Furthermore, the 1550 LD model offers a good passenger capacity, making it an ideal choice for urban and highway transportation companies.

Credits: FC

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: CMA SCANIA 4×2 Flecha II v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 24, 2025

CMA SCANIA 4×2 Flecha II v1.0 ETS2

MOD UPDATED!
For ETS 2 versions: | 1.54.x | 1.55.x | 1.56.x
In short, the CMA Scania Mod is not just an add-on for your game; it’s a celebration of automotive engineering and digital art. Congratulations on owning and appreciating such a rare gem in the simulator universe!
The CMA Scania bus is a true masterpiece in the world of road vehicles. Every detail has been meticulously crafted to provide an unparalleled driving experience. From the exterior design, which captures the robust and elegant essence of Scania vehicles, to the interior, where every button and lever is faithfully reproduced, this mod is a tribute to excellence in 3D modeling that brings back the nautical spirit of the best buses of yesteryear.
The CMA Scania Mod’s performance is simply spectacular. Realistic physics make every journey an authentic adventure, allowing you to feel every curve and acceleration as if you were actually behind the wheel of a CMA Scania. Detailed animations, such as door openings and pedal movements, add an extra level of immersion that’s hard to find in other mods.
Mod Information

This mod contains:
Driver’s window animation;
Accelerator and brake pedal animation;
Luggage compartment animation;
Passenger door animation; Detail: when the driver’s door and window are opened, rain follows.
Optional open or closed cabin;
Cabin items such as decorations and others;
Window seals;
Road and Charter stickers;
Air conditioning;
Seat covers;
2 optional gearshifts;
Some Scania steering wheels;
Animated air spring;
3 GPS positions;
Glass on the dashboard for a more realistic look;
Emblems and logos for you to customize;
Original and High-Power engines with 2 types of sounds;
Rear antenna option;
2 passenger carpet colors;
3 dashboard types: wood, original leather, and carbon fiber.
Upholstery options: interior wall, curtains, seats, and ceiling.
This mod also includes 2 rearview mirrors for you to choose from.
Skins from previous companies;
Skins for you to edit;
Signs for you to edit;
License plates for you to edit as you wish;

Credits: FC

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Slovensko+ (Silesia Version) v0.6 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 24, 2025

Slovensko+ (Silesia Version) v0.6 ETS2

Cities
Lovinobana – definition only
Kosice – reworked
Plastovce – definition only
Velky Krtis
Potor
Cary
Kuty
Ružomberok
Trenčín – definition only, will be activated in v4.0

Roads
Refresh I-66 (E77) Zvolen – Budapest
Rework I-16 (E58) Zvolen – Kosice
Rework I-17 Kosice – Debrecen
Semi-rework D1 in Kosice and surroundings.
Adds I-75 (Hungary – Bratislava)
Improves small part of D4 near Bratislava
Updates old assets on D2 in Bratislava
Refreshes I-51 ( Trnava – Kuty – Cz. Rep. )
Refreshed R1 (E58) ( Zvolen – Trnava )

Compatibility for Euro Truck Simulator 2 v1.56,
Compatibility for Silesia v1.7.1,
Compatibility for ProMods v2.76,
Fixed terrain loss in Kosice due to new ETS2 update regarding height blend.

Credits: AndrewS_

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
